Room.Name: Rudolph's Fighting Academy
Room.ShortDescription: Welcome to Rudolph's Fighting Academy, training location for fighters.
Room.LongDescription: Rudolph's Fighting Academy is a moderate-level training location for Fighters wishing to obtain Warrior status. If you are applying for Warrior status for the first time, you should enter the blue door. If you are applying for Warrior Second Class status, enter the green door. If you are applying for Warrior First Class status, enter the red door. Behind each door, you will find a single opponent that you must defeat. Once defeated in hand-to-hand combat, you will be allowed to train.
